arguments.response_text: Hi, my name is Wally. I moved from Vietnam when I was 16 years old. I moved to Boston, Massachusetts because my parents wanted to find a better place for me to get my education. And I love America. I love Boston. But I also love Vietnam. And I miss it sometimes. But I love seeing Vietnam in new places. And I see that a lot in Boston. And I love America.
arguments.response_summary: The response discusses Wally's background, moving from Vietnam to Boston, his love for both countries, and his connection to Vietnam.
arguments.matched_prompt: How did you and your family build a life in Chicago?
